text: @SenatorLoeffler @SenateGOP Never forget Georgia residents. When she knew how dangerous this pandemic was, she concealed it from you while "coincidently" placing big $ investments that capitalized on it. Think about how contemptuous she is of your lives when the suffering & death ramp up. Tell your friends.
